title: 95/169/EC: Commission Decision of 12 May 1995 amending Decision 94/617/EC adopting the plan allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1995 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 May 1995 amending Decision 94/617/EC adopting the plan  allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1995 budget year for the supply of  food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community  (95/169/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 94/617/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex  hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 May 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
